page.title: 20EAST HULL FIRE STATION
page.content: {Southcoates Lane Fire Station}is one of the stations in the Humberside Fire Brigade. It is a small station having just two fire tenders, one of which is kept as a reserve. The tenders are diesel driven and are expected to be able to get to emergencies very quickly. They should be able to get anywhere in their area within 20 minutes, although they can get to most places much faster than this. Whilst each tender is euipped for most emergencies with high pressure water hoses, ladders, high speed cutters, radiation counters etc. they can call up specialist equipment that is based nearby, such as foam firing tenders to fight oil fires. Big fires are rare and most of their business is in dealing with small emergencies such as chip pan fires.
